result.title: Multi-Paradigm Distributed Transformation Engine
result.description: This deliverable will present the algorithms and the tools supporting scalable model transformation over the Cloud It will include 1 a multiparadigm translator for a model transformation language to different distributed programming models 2 a native live transformation engine based upon distributed incremental model queries and 3 a transformation composition engine that automatic selects from the repository the model transformations to compose for achieving the needed manipulation and orchestrates the transformation chain

result.title: WP6 Publications and Dissemination
result.description: We estimate that the output of scientific publications from ELENAs participants will not be less than 80 peerreviewed papers We also anticipate a number of technical reports and 23 conference contributions annually from each ESRs projectIn WP5 publication technical reports and conference contributions will mainly be oni Novel platform photoresistsii LEE interaction EUVL compounds in the gas phaseiii Multi dimensional parameter optimizationiv Composition control through multiple gas inletsv Computer simulations of nanostructure growth All scientific publications and conference contributions will be made public on ELENAs web site in accordance with copyright law This is an ongoing process but intermediary summary reports on ELENAs scientific output for individual WPs will be delivered M18 and M36
